🏵️SKIN BENEFITS: Calendula water delivers comfortable rest and optimal moisture ratio to irritated skin. Also, nourish your skin, revitalize, soothing and moisturizing your tired skin.

🏵️ALCOHOL-FREE: This item is an astringent without alcohol or an unpleasant alcohol fragrance! Skin will be left thoroughly cleansed and conditioned without disturbing its natural moisture. you'll be amazed at the soothing, non-drying nature of Celleanser's.
🏵️QUICK SOOTHING CARE: Hydrating your skin which is sensitive due to external stimulus with low pH blue water formula so that balancing skin's pH level and calming the skin
🏵️Calendula Extract 100% Purified water Zero : Non-synthetic pigments, animal-free raw materials, non-matt oil, parabens, Non fragrances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good.
reviews.reviewText: I take good care of my skin and I wanted to try this toner and I like it. I have sensitive skin and it has done its job well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing and effective
reviews.reviewText: Both Centella Asiatica and Calendula CELLEANSER Real Toner offers a refreshing and effective skincare experience with its 100% one-ingredient extract water. The formula provides remarkable skin relief and soothing benefits, leaving the face feeling revitalized and balanced. The minimalist approach with a single, potent ingredient speaks volumes about the product's commitment to purity and efficacy. The gentle nature of the toner makes it ideal for those with sensitive skin, offering a calming solution to irritation. With CELLEANSER Real Toner, the emphasis on quality, simplicity, and its Korean origin establishes it as a trustworthy addition to any skincare routine. Arrived sealed with plastic wrapped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Refreshing on your face does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but not life changing.
reviews.reviewText: I use it every morning on a cotton pad instead of washing my face so my natural oils can do its thing but also being able to get rid of the gunk left on the surface. It's great for cleaning the skin gently in the morning, so much dust comes off, which is shocking. But it hasn't really changed my skin or anything so I won't be repurchasing, but it's alright If you only need it to clean your face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Underrated tea tree toner needs more love
reviews.reviewText: As a k-beauty junkie, I have tried many different skincare items over the years and one ingredient I always go back to is tea tree.So I've tried quite a few toners in the Korean market that have tea tree as the main ingredient but this toner, it's literally only ONE ingredient! It's just tea tree extract water!After finding this out, I had to try it and I've only been using it about 2 days and I'm already seeing some good changes in my skin. I live in a hot state (thank you Texas) and I have oily skin with large pores so not the best combination. This toner not only helped with the state of my pores, it actually feels like my other skincare products are sinking into my skin and doing work!This might be a great answer to my problem so I'm writing this review so hopefully others will take note of this product and Amazon will keep on selling it. I hate loving a new product and then immediately getting sidelined when Amazon decides to stop carrying it.I know the bigger brands in Korea usually get more love, but these more unknown brands need some attention too. Especially when they produce toners in bigger sizes than the usual 5oz, which by the way, doesn't last very long when you're an avid toner user like me. Please keep this in stock Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product made my skin so soft
reviews.reviewText: Yes, I would definitely recommend this if you have sensitive skin or dry skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made my skin feel nice
reviews.reviewText: I got this 1 ingredient toner bc most toners make my skin burn and I was hoping this wouldn’t and it doesn’t! It makes my skin feel very nice and when it absorbs it gives my skin a nice glow this is just after one use so I can’t say anything about long term affects

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on sensitive, broken out skin
reviews.reviewText: (My skin type: oily combo hormonal) I bought the centella toner because my skin is hormonal and flaring up and my skin can get really sensitive and dry suddenly from allergies and psoriasis.I've honestly only used it 5 times and when I usually use it, I drench a cotton sheet mask in it and leave it on my face for 15 minutes to soothe my skin then swipe the sheet mask over my face and neck.Doesn't make noticeable changes to acne so far (but my hormonal acne is usually stubborn and takes a good couple of weeks to clear up again), but it definitely helps to soothe my skin when it's itchy and irritated. Also helped when my skin stubbornly wouldn't absorb any essence or serums. After washing my face during a bad allergy flare up.
